description: Number of ways to represent n as k/d(k).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: a[n_] := Count[Table[n == k/DivisorSigma[0, k], {k, 1, 4*n^2}], True]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 100}]  (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 22 2012 *)
prog: (Haskell)a051521 n = length [k | k <- [1..4*n^2],                        let d = a000005 k, divMod k d == (n,0)]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 28 2011
author: _David W. Wilson_
